website_summaries.verdict: Though the Audyssey Audio Dock is on the expensive side, it's one of the better-sounding--and versatile--iPod/iPhone audio systems with built-in Bluetooth and speakerphone capabilities we've tested.
pros: Excellent sound with good detail and bass
GSM-shielded so iPhone doesn't need to be switched into airplane mode
built-in Bluetooth for wireless streaming from iPhone, other mobile devices, or Bluetooth-enabled PC
cons: vertical styling may not appeal to some buyers

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: After having gone though the Octiv 650's, I was skeptical of another iPod/iPhone dock system but I decided to give it another go because I simply did not want a 2.1 system due to space restrictions / visual appeal. These speakers are amazing. For those concerned about bass - it is honestly phenomenal - use the (free) EQ application and you can set your own settings. This is seriously one of the best purchases I have ever made. Audyssey is unquestionably a premier source of breathtaking music equipment, and these speakers are only a testament to their ability. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun Arya

customer_reviews.title: A real looker with sound to match
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker system. It is so sexy and the sound is very well rounded. The bass is powerful. When I play it at a party, people gravitate towards it to admire it. It is a design flaw though that you can only control the volume through the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Read previous reviews. Top 3 previously stated. Love this. Sound rich and bass, volume is loud enough. More features with Bluetooth and doubles as speakers for other device. IPhone dock solid with rear cushion support. Woul buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: P. JEN

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived packed very well and in described condition with all accessories. My Audyssey Audio Dock was a refurbished item but is performing to this point like new. I am very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Unruh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty remarkable
customer_reviews.text: I listened to as many docks as I could locally including all the Bose products. I really wasn't all that happy with any of them. The most expensive sony and Bose were decent, but not amazing. The bass wasn't all that tight and the high end wasn't all that crisp. I decided to take a risk and try the Audessy....nothing short of amazing. How that sound comes out of such a small package is beyond me. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long for $300.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was great until it got very hot and had smoke pouring out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Weinschenk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audiophile by any means but I was amazed by the sound from this "dock" speaker.No sound distortion at any volume level and the sound can fill up a medium size room easily.Blue tooth connection is okay within about 30 feet.Music is louder when phone is docked than with bluetooth connection.I noticed that the speaker does get hot after some usage.Remote control doesnt have much range and hardly works at angles (this can get frustrating if you want to mute the speaker in a hurry).The iphone app is okay but I wish it had on/off feature and volume controls.Overall an excellent product,worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audyssey South of Market
customer_reviews.text: Very delighted with the quality of sound, and its features. Its nice to have something that sounds so good and is portable. I feel I made an excellent purchase, after reading poitive reviews on this product
customer_reviews.author: Mr.P

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love music and I'm quite a snob when it comes to audio devices. When shopping for a high end dock for my iphone, I personally listened to all the docks priced $400 and more, including the B&W Zeppelin and B&O. They are larger, more expensive, and do not sound as good as the Audyssey South of Market one. I'm on my way to buy another one for my office...
customer_reviews.author: Shimon Kogan

customer_reviews.title: fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I got this last week and I am absolutely loving it. Great sound, way better than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best sound for your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my college son. He loves it. The bluetooth option is the best feature it offers. Best sound for your money. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaia

customer_reviews.title: Little Enclosure, Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great looks, great sound. Using it in a 6500sf warehouse area and it fills it up with excellent sound quality. Minor complaint- the remote control has a very short operating range, perhaps 30 feet. Otherwise an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: The product came out of the box and failed to work with two different iPhones. I don't see much excuse for this kind of poor quality control. Of course Amazon took it back, as they always make good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fillat

customer_reviews.title: You got listed to believe this
customer_reviews.text: First of all lets not even compare this with Bose 10.. This is light years better than Bose.. The sound quality is out of the world for this small speakers.. Can connect laptop, bluetooth mobiles and all IPod and IPhone version without an issue. Range is pretty good.. I looks great and will attract attention.. Their patented audio is great with deep bass and crystal clear sound even from mp3's.. You can connect multiple bluettoth devices at the same time.. I have a bose 5 series system and the sound is equivalent to the quality from my 5.1 system.. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive system for Apple users. It is the only one I found that has the features to dock, sync, charge, play, and it's also a speaker phone. Works with my iPod, iPhone and iPad. Great sound, easy to use, small one unit system, and great features. I had iHome speakers before. It was two speakers, didn't sound as good, didn't play my iPhone, didn't sync and no speaker phone. The Audyssey costs more, but more features and much better speaker.
customer_reviews.author: emurph

customer_reviews.title: Excelent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Works perfect with the iPod Touch 64gb 4th generation. I am very happy. This is my first iPod. I am 69 and I wanted something nice looking and great sound. This is it. I also downloaded and installed the Audyssey South of Market Audio Dock iPhone app. The app gives you unprecedented control to customize the sound of the Audio Dock.
customer_reviews.author: Etaner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPod/iPhone/Mac speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker on a whim when the one I wanted wasn't in stock. It's amazing! Plays such a clear, full-range sound for it's deceptively small size and doesn't shy away when you turn the volume up. It can play music from a docked device, via audio cable and wirelessly via Bluetooth. It also syncs iPods/iPhones to attached computers. The speakerphone function is also awesome and has come in handy on many occasions. I highly recommend this speaker if you are in the market for a great one.
customer_reviews.author: KiwiEye

customer_reviews.title: Speaker blew and started to smoke after six months
customer_reviews.text: After six months of ownership, it started to smoke when I turned it on! The speakers cracked and smoke started to pour out...I never play music loudly and this morning was no exception. Terrible, dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hi-fi Audio
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, i place it just right at my side in my office, and the sound is really detailed. Don't expect a lot of bass, it just kick as the song demand. You can download the application for your iPhone, with that, you can tweak the settings, like Dynamic Volume, Tone Controls and setup a EQ. Is a elegant speaker too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Cazarez

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research on the Bose, beats audio, and audyssey docking stations, I finally settled on the audyssey. Mostly because of the great reviews on amazon and the lower price tag. I was a little skeptical that this thing would match up to the for-mentioned systems because it is so much cheaper. But I must say that I was pleasantly surprised at how great the system sounds. It has a very full sound to it. Good highs, good lows, and good mids. I am the owner of an $1800 Polk audio theater system so I know good sound when I hear it. Believe the reviews. This thing rocks. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible company service
customer_reviews.text: The Audyssey Dock functions pretty well as advertised. It is at least as good as the comparable Bose and at a better price. However, the unit I received was defective. It took nearly a month for the company to replace it. I was forced to pay $22 for shipping to return the defective unit. The representative refused to reimburse me for the shipping, stating that it was company policy not to reimburse. The defect was their fault, not mine. Their service policy blemished what is otherwise a satisfactory product. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: dyetman

customer_reviews.title: i never write reviews, but when i do...
customer_reviews.text: well, actually this is the first product in my life ive ever felt the need to write a review about it. nothing compares, deep( and i mean real effing deep) lows and crisp high notes. do yourself a favor and ignore every other iphone dock and get this one. bluetooth does not result in lesser music quality too.
customer_reviews.author: teddyk46

customer_reviews.title: Best sound in class
customer_reviews.text: Great system. I love it and use it everyday. Have been a Bose fan all my life, but this is definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Nimrod

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Audyssey
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved the Audyssey South of Market Audio Dock for Christmas and I am very impressed!!!! The qaulity is phenomenal and it blows Bose out of the water. I am so happy my husband bought it for me and I would definately reccomend it to others. The unit gets very loud and has very clean hard bass with no speaker rattle whatsoever. We set it up in the kitchen and can hear it clearly all over the house. Awesome product!!!!!! Well worth the money ; )
customer_reviews.author: Luv4makeup

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great look. The sound is clear and just awesome! Better than the Bose ipod dock. You can find this unit at Costco online for $299.00
customer_reviews.author: Murielle Robert

product_meta.title: Audyssey Audio Dock Speaker System for iPod and iPhone
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWirelessly stream music from your iPod or iPhone. Combining wireless music streaming, built-in speakerphone, patented bass and equalization technologies and more, the South of Market is one amazing audio dock for your iPhone or iPod. Part iPod Dock, part desktop speaker, part speakerphone, the South of Market Audio Dock seamlessly integrates with your iPhone for amazing sound. Hear all the details in your favorite music thanks to Audyssey EQ technology. Phone calls are clear and echo free with array microphone processing. The small footprint lets the audio dock fit any environment, even your desktop or kitchen counter. Remote control and power cable, Two 3.5mm audio cables, and quick start guide included. Features: Part iPod Dock, part desktop speaker, part speakerphone, the South of Market Audio Dock seamlessly integrates with your iPhone for amazing sound. Hear all the details in your favorite music thanks to Audyssey EQ technology. Phone calls are clear and echo free with array microphone processing. The small footprint lets the audio dock fit any environment, even your desktop or kitchen counter. Highlights: Wireless music streaming—undock and the music still plays Charge and Sync when you dock your iPhone Clear speakerphone calls with two built-in microphones Audyssey BassXT, Audyssey EQ and three other innovative technologies ensure great sound Audyssey iPhone app provides additional control and customizable EQ Streamlined design is perfect for the desktop, kitchen counter or night stand Sound defies its size Compatibility: iPhone 4 iPhone 3GS iPhone 3G iPod touch 3rd generation iPod touch 2nd generation iPod classic 120GB 160GB (2009) iPod classic 160GB (2007) iPod classic 80GB iPod nano 5th generation (video camera) iPod nano 4th generation (video). Power: Input Voltage 100VAC-120VAC (50/60 Hz) Factory set based on location / 220VAC -240VAC (50 Hz) Factory set based on location.
feature_bullets: Computer connection to charge and sync with iTunes
Built in speakerphone for answering calls
Innovative audio technologies for rich sound
iPhone app for customized sound and EQ
Power Requirements: Input Voltage 100VAC-120VAC (50/60 Hz) Factory set based on location / 220VAC -240VAC (50 Hz) Factory set based on location

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
